title: double O ligature fonts
content:
Hi,

I am looking for fonts which have the double-O ligature.  
The only ones that spring to mind are Mrs Eaves, Esta, Estilo...

Do you know of any other?

Thanks!
author: hackum

comments.content: [Optima Nova Titling Capitals](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019101820/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima-nova-lt/) and -- of course! -- [ITC Avant Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019101820/http:/www.linotype.com/2439/itcavantgardegothic.html), which seems to come with a double lowercase o (as seen in the image in my link, at least).

What about the good old Avant Garde Gothic? [Upper case](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019101820/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic/std-medium/glyphs/541351/344)? [Lower case](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019101820/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic/std-medium/glyphs/541351/360)?

Exljbris: Calluna  
HVD: Livory  
Sudtypos: Esmeralda Pro, Monroe, Uma  
Positype: Magneta  
DSType: Finura, Andrade Pro, Kartago, Nerva, Estilo Pro  
Canada Type: Orpheus Pro, Jupiter Pro, Ronaldson, Lancelot Pro  
Green Type: Patriciana

That's great! Too many to choose from now...  
Thank you.
